thread.title: BRIEF-Scholastic Q3 Loss Per Share $1.41 From Continuing Operations

title: BRIEF-Scholastic Q3 Loss Per Share $1.41 From Continuing Operations
text: March 21, 2018 / 10:00 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Scholastic Q3 Loss Per Share $1.41 From Continuing Operations Reuters Staff March 21 (Reuters) - Scholastic Corp: * SCHOLASTIC REPORTS FISCAL 2018 THIRD QUARTER RESULTS; RAISES EPS OUTLOOK * Q3 REVENUE ROSE 3 PERCENT TO $344.7 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.35 TO $1.45 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q3 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.30 EXCLUDING ITEMS * SCHOLASTIC - Q3 RESULTS INCLUDE NON-CASH PRE-TAX CHARGE OF $0.76/SHARE, RELATED TO TERMINATION OF DOMESTIC DEFINED BENEFIT RETIREMENT PLAN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
